'''Miroslav Fidler''' was the author and designer of the game [[Belegost (video game)|Belegost]].<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/belegost.html Belegost] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 30 December 2010)</ref><ref>[http://www.worldofspectrum.org/infoseek.cgi Belegost] at [[wikipedia:World of Spectrum|World of Spectrum]] (retrieved 30 December 2010)</ref>
